description: This file defines internal interfaces and includes for the ZHAL (Zigbee Hardware Abstraction Layer) component within the Zilker project. It declares functions for handling events and requests, as well as accessing callback information, and includes necessary headers.

methods.name: zhalHandleEvent
methods.description: Handles events received by the ZHAL component, processing a JSON event object.

methods.name: zhalSendRequest
methods.description: Sends a request to a target EUI-64 address with a JSON request object, returning a JSON response.

methods.name: getCallbacks
methods.description: Retrieves the current callbacks configuration for ZHAL.

methods.name: getCallbackContext
methods.description: Provides the context associated with the current callbacks.
